messages.message: so I dont know how true are the above statements, I did a ctr+F across the whole repo for (AIHUB_DEFAULT_OPENAI_MODEL) and I didnt find any file that contained it
so I dont know if there is any patch that alters the default config

for example in the SAAS directories I only see this patch that doesn’t touch what am I doing: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/deployment-configs/environment-[…]tenant/aihub-eu/deployment-model-service-openai-api-version.yml (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/deployment-configs/environment-patches/saas-advanced-patches/saas-hierarchial-patches/tenant/aihub-eu/deployment-model-service-openai-api-version.yml)
Yeah it seems to me that it's probably safe enough to add your patch into the saas directory so it affects all saas + internal environments
